name: Material Design Icons
description:
What's inside

This set contains all Material Design icons in version 4.0.0 (Last update 2022-03-28) with all five themes.


Inside you will find 3 pages:

Single component

Here, you will find all icons as a single component where you change the icons and theme using properties


Instances

For that who want to use the "Instance swap property":

  • Theme / Icon name - All icons are separate components where components are grouped by theme and Icon name for those who use more than a single theme in the design system.
  • Icons name / Theme - All icons are separate components where components are grouped by Icons name and then by the theme for those who what's to use a single theme in the design system.


All icon names are consistent with the names of the icons available on the Google Fonts page.


About file

Recently I created a set of Material Design Foundation styles with Icons. But I thought some people need only Material Design Icons, so I made this file with icons only.


I will be happy to hear your feedback and suggestions on making this set better and more valuable. If you like my work, please share it, leave a comment, leave a like.


About the Author

My name is Patryk, and I’m a Product Designer with over ten years of hands-on experience. I am focused on bringing you the best viable solutions for the product and creating tools that make people’s lives easier.


Source

Set is based on the Material Design Icons, version 4.0.0. published by the Google team on GitHub - https://github.com/google/material-design-icons
